about_the_game:
Toon Team is a multiplayer online 3rd person shooter game with RPG elements, made in a "cartoon" style.

RED or BLUE?

Choose a side of the conflict. And decide who is right.
In one of the many game modes: Team DeathMatch, Classic DeathMatch​, Capture The Flag​, Co-op Base Defense vs. Bots​..

In the game you will find:

  • 20 — types of weapons
  • 4 — classes of fighters
  • 4 — game modes

GameModes:

  • Team Deathmatch
  • Classic DeathMatch (One vs. All)
  • Capture The Flag
  • Co-op Base Defense vs. Bots

Other:

  • Map Editor — create building your maps and playing friends.
  • Text chat — share useful information with the opposing team or write a good joke for your team.
  • Voice Chat — Tell your team about combat tactics or sing them a song.
  • Voting system — if a player on your team violates the rules of communication or behavior, create a vote to decide his fate. Or create a vote to change the map.

Single-player (play the GameModes against/with bots)
Online-Multiplayer (Host and join your friends servers online).

name: Toon Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: 1.9 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card with 1024 MB or more of memory supporting Pixel Shader 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core processor or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible video card with 2048 MB or more of memory supporting Pixel Shader 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Choose your fighter and team. Decide who's tougher. Play with friends. In one of the many game modes: Team Deathmatch, One vs. All, Capture the Flag, Defend the Base from the Enemy.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Armenian
*languages with full audio support
